name: fluocinolone acetonide

indications.text: fluocinolone acetonide topical oil , 0.01 % corticosteroid indicated • topical treatment atopic dermatitis adult patients ( 1.1 ) • topical treatment moderate severe atopic dermatitis pediatric patients 3 months older 4 weeks ( 1.2 ) limitations : • apply least amount cover affected areas . discontinue disease controlled . ( 1.3 ) • diaper area . ( 1.3 ) • face , axillae , groin . ( 1.3 , 6.2 , 8.4 )

contraindications.text: fluocinolone acetonide topical oil , 0.01 % oral , ophthalmic , intravaginal . dosing fluocinolone acetonide topical oil , 0.01 % different adult pediatric patients .

warningsAndPrecautions: fluocinolone acetonide topical oil , 0.01 % ( body oil ) ndc : 72162-1434-2 : 118.28 ml bottle storage : store 25°c ( 68°-77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15-30°c ( 59-86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc. burbank , ca 91504
indications_original: Fluocinolone Acetonide Topical Oil, 0.01% is a corticosteroid indicated for the • topical treatment of atopic dermatitis in adult patients ( 1.1 ) • topical treatment of moderate to severe atopic dermatitis in pediatric patients 3 months and older for up to 4 weeks ( 1.2 ) Limitations of Use: • Apply the least amount to cover affected areas. Discontinue when disease is controlled. ( 1.3 ) • Do not use in the diaper area. ( 1.3 ) • Do not use on the face, axillae, or groin. ( 1.3 , 6.2 , 8.4 )
contraindications_original:
Fluocinolone Acetonide Topical Oil, 0.01% is not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
                  
                     The dosing of Fluocinolone Acetonide Topical Oil, 0.01% is different for adult and pediatric patients.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Fluocinolone Acetonide Topical Oil, 0.01% (Body Oil)
                  
                  NDC: 72162-1434-2: 118.28 mL in a BOTTLE
                  
                     Storage:
                  
                  Store at 25°C (68°-77°F); excursions permitted to 15-30°C (59-86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:
                  Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.
                  Burbank, CA 91504
